title: Adapting is the only way to survive
description: I’m on TikTok now. A place I said I would never be. A place I never wanted to be. A place I never studied to be. But I’m here, and so are my peers. I keep thinking to myself, it’s almost complete: My influencerfication is nearly finished. I bought a tripod and a mini microphone....
content: I’m on TikTok now. A place I said I would never be. A place I never wanted to be. A place I never studied to be. But I’m here, and so are my peers. I keep thinking to myself, it’s almost complete: My influencerfication is nearly finished. I bought a tripod and a mini microphone....
